about.text:
Hi,
I'm Neil. I'm a 15 year old self-taught web developer, and I've also done some work in C# and Java before.

activities.text: I take part in my Local Teen Council, and I act as their Twitter and Instagram boy.
I enjoy working on my neighbors 1996 NA Mazda Miata

projects.name: Blackjack (updated)
projects.description: A revamped version of my past Blackjack game. Features totally not unfair gameplay

projects.name: Blackjack (alpha)
projects.description: Created in 8th grade at the request of a friend, the game is no longer playable. Contains a menu and changeable music!

projects.name: Branches of Government
projects.description: Created in 8th grade, this is a website with design from HTML5UP which has information about the 3 branches of government

projects.name: Budget Quizlet
projects.description: A cheap version of Quizlet's "Learn" feature

projects.name: TKAM eReader
projects.description: A simple eReader that only loads To Kill a Mockingbird

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A weather app which uses the Weather.gov API to tell you the weather

projects.name: Tic Toe
projects.description: A simple Tic Tac Toe game, that may or may not make you wait a little bit :)
